channel.title: Fixing your compiler
channel.description:
ok so example. my jdk version is jdk-1_5_0_09-windows-i586-p
and my server name is MeepedScape
my compiler look like this.
@echo off COLOR 08 title (YOURSERVERNAMEHERE) Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause
notice the jdk1.5.0_09. so if your jdk was jdk-1_5_0_08-windows-i586-p in your compiler youd turn _09 to _08 get it :confused:
alright to get to your compiler:
go to your game files
then,
find your compiler
right click on it and hit enter
copy and paste @echo off COLOR 08 title (YOURSERVERNAMEHERE) Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause
into your compiler and change YOURSERVERNAMEHERE to your server name
then jdk.5.0_09 to your java.
if you need better help ill help you on msn..
i_r_ryan_k@hotmail.com
cya later and i hope i can help someone
if this helps make a msg below so this doesnt get erased, need it for all the ppl who dont have friends to tell them how to do thsi stuff

item.title: Fixing your compiler
item.dc:creator: @meeped meeped
item.description:
@meeped wrote:

ok so example. my jdk version is jdk-1_5_0_09-windows-i586-p

and my server name is MeepedScape

my compiler look like this.

@echo off
COLOR 08
title (YOURSERVERNAMEHERE) Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

notice the jdk1.5.0_09. so if your jdk was jdk-1_5_0_08-windows-i586-p in your compiler youd turn _09 to _08 get it

alright to get to your compiler:

go to your game files

then,

find your compiler

right click on it and hit enter

copy and paste @echo off
COLOR 08
title (YOURSERVERNAMEHERE) Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

into your compiler and change YOURSERVERNAMEHERE to your server name

then jdk.5.0_09 to your java.

if you need better help ill help you on msn…

i_r_ryan_k@hotmail.com

cya later and i hope i can help someone

if this helps make a msg below so this doesnt get erased, need it for all the ppl who dont have friends to tell them how to do thsi stuff
